name: bluefish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a blue-coloured sea fish that is caught for food and sport: Try sautéing bluefish in olive oil to take advantage of its health-giving properties. Over-fishing has led to a collapse in numbers of bluefish, swordfish, and cod in the Atlantic.
More examplesFewer examplesPlace the bluefish fillets in a dish, skin-side up.I like salmon rare, but I prefer bluefish to be cooked all the way through.On my first cast, I hooked a bluefish that felt like a submarine.
